A Science Fraught With Peril.--We do not ask you to place yourself under the control of any man's mind. The mind cure is the most awful science which has ever been 


                                                     717 

advocated. Every wicked being can use it in carrying through his own evil designs. We have no business with any such science. We should be afraid of it. Never should the first principles of it be brought into any institution. --MS 105, 1901.(MM 116.)
